subject: Soccer
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Wendell Silva Lira won a FIFA award for the best goal of 2015 for an acrobatic score in a lower-tier game in Brazil, thanks to lots of views on YouTube and a heavy push by Brazilian sites.
snippet: Wendell Silva Lira won a FIFA award for the best goal of 2015 for an acrobatic score in a lower-tier game in Brazil, thanks to lots of views on YouTube and a heavy push by Brazilian sites.
